name: Opposite Game
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Up, Down, Left, Right!

The player should do the opposite of the instruction as quickly as possible.

Use the arrow keys in KEYBOARD mode.

In MOUSE mode, the player can press C to switch camera views.

After the game ends, press Space to restart the game or Backspace to go back to the main menu.

CREDITS

All credits for music and sound effects go to  Fesliyan Studios and Mixkit.

Hope you enjoy the game!
